评论概述: Everything I expected from Whitin… but durability might be an issue

To be fair, this shoe is not a Heybro, but considering its price, there is not much to complain about. It offers value for money. The shoe is lightweight and easy to wear, and the breathable material provides comfort. Additionally, it is affordable. Instead of spending $60 on a pair of shoes, you can try these and likely be satisfied. However, if you intend to use these shoes daily, I recommend investing in some supportive insoles to provide adequate support for your feet and back. After a few months of regular wear, I noticed that the inside of the shoe can cause discomfort in the feet and back. Apart from this, it is a reliable and solid shoe.
